Row.Text: Produces 1 [ICON_UB_COFFEE] Coffee Beans, a Luxury Resource. +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when constructing Buildings. [NEWLINE]Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Windmill[ENDCOLOR].
Produced only at the Brazilian [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Coffee Plant[ENDCOLOR].

Coffee is a brewed beverage with a distinct aroma and flavor prepared from the roasted seeds of the coffea plant. Coffee is slightly acidic and can have a stimulating effect on humans due to its caffeine content. It is one of the most-consumed beverages in the world.
